name: Anomander Rake
description: Son of Darkness, wielder of Dragnipur, lord of Moon's Spawn and reluctant god-slayer.

name: Icarium
description: A half-Jaghut wanderer with immense destructive potential and a lost past he cannot remember.

name: Karsa Orlong
description: A Toblakai warrior with unparalleled strength and a destiny that shapes empires and gods alike.

name: Quick Ben
description: Bridgeburner mage and master schemer, hiding more secrets and warrens than anyone knows.

name: Tayschrenn
description: Imperial High Mage, master of multiple warrens, known for his explosive and controlled sorcery.

name: Shadowthrone
description: The god of Shadow and former Emperor Kellanved, mastermind behind many divine manipulations.

name: Cotillion
description: Patron of assassins, the Rope, formerly Dancer, silent hand behind Shadowthrone’s plans.

name: Fiddler
description: Bridgeburner sapper turned sergeant of the Bonehunters, known for his luck and loyalty.

name: Tavore Paran
description: Adjunct of the Malazan Empire, enigmatic leader of the Bonehunters with unwavering discipline.

name: Felisin Paran
description: Youngest Paran sibling who becomes the reborn Sha’ik and figurehead of the Whirlwind Rebellion.

name: Heboric Ghost Hands
description: Former priest of Fener turned reluctant prophet and wielder of divine, decaying power.

name: Onos T’oolan
description: First Sword of the Imass, bound to eternal war but seeking peace through honor.

name: Trull Sengar
description: Exiled Edur warrior with a poetic soul and tragic fate.

name: Tehol Beddict
description: Mad genius and Letherii economist who brought down an empire with accounting and wit.

name: Brys Beddict
description: The King's Champion of Lether, peerless swordsman and embodiment of discipline.

name: Dassem Ultor
description: Once the First Sword of the Empire, now hunted by gods and legends alike.

name: Ganoes Paran
warren: Hood's Path / Master of the Deck
description: From soldier to Master of the Deck, Paran walks the line between mortal and myth.

name: Skinner
description: One of the Avowed, commander of the Crimson Guard, feared for his brutality and ambition.

name: Kalam Mekhar
description: Deadliest assassin in the Empire, Bridgeburner, and unswerving blade of cause over crown.

name: Ammanas (Shadowthrone)
description: Same entity as Shadowthrone — unpredictable and manipulative master of the Shadow Realm.

name: Rake (Draconus-form)
description: Lord of Moon’s Spawn in his true Soletaken Dragon form, devastation incarnate.

name: Draconus
description: Elder god who forged Dragnipur, father of Rake, and long-enslaved to his own creation.

name: Grub
description: Once a child soldier, now whispered as the Shield Anvil of the future.

name: Stormy
description: Bridgeburner turned divine warrior, loyal beyond death and storm-forged in battle.

name: Gesler
description: Stormy's companion and fellow Ascendant, chosen by the Wolves of War.

name: Raest
description: An ancient Jaghut Tyrant, awakened with vengeance on his frozen heart.

name: Buke
description: A dependable soldier known more for steadiness than storm.

name: Corabb Bhilan Thenu’alas
description: Faith-driven soldier who followed Tavore to the end, blindly yet bravely.

name: Leoman of the Flails
description: Charismatic and deadly warrior, right hand of Sha'ik, enigmatic to the last.

name: Troll
description: Brother of Rhulad, torn between family and honor.

name: Rhulad Sengar
description: Chosen and cursed by the Crippled God, endlessly reborn and tragically broken.

name: Udinaas
description: Letherii slave and poet, vessel for the soul of Scabandari Bloodeye.

name: Feather Witch
description: A Letherii seer whose ambition and wrath shake the fates themselves.

name: The Errant
description: Elder being meddling with fate, obsessed with balance and control.

name: Karos Invictad
description: Letherii security chief, embodiment of systemic rot and cowardice.

name: Seren Pedac
description: Truthseer and historian, caught between knowledge and duty.

name: Hannan Mosag
description: Warlock King of the Edur, wielder of chaos and ambition.

name: Kilmandaros
description: Elder goddess of destruction, raw power in motherly flesh.

name: Scabandari Bloodeye
description: Father of the Edur Empire, sealed by betrayal and shadow.

name: Temper
description: Veteran of countless wars and former shield to Dassem Ultor.

name: Lady Envy
description: Daughter of Draconus, absurdly powerful and ever sardonic in battle.

name: Kruppe
description: Eel of Darujhistan, master manipulator, friend of mages and kings alike.

name: Baruk
description: Alchemist and High Mage of Darujhistan, discreet but deadly.

name: Mappo Runt
description: Bound protector of Icarium, tormented by duty and love.

name: Kallor
description: Once a king who burned his world; his ambition and curse endure eternally.

name: Tulas Shorn
description: Soletaken Eleint, chained to grief and ghostly duty.

name: Moranth Gold Commander
description: Commanders of the secretive Moranth legions — deadly and enigmatic.

name: Coltaine
description: The Chain of Dogs' leader, hero of a doomed march and a symbol of sacrifice.

name: Lostara Yil
description: Claw of the Queen and Shield of D’rek, blade and belief entwined.

name: Shadow Hound (Rashan)
description: A primordial predator roaming the Shadow Realm — as loyal as it is lethal.

name: Toblakai Champion
description: An unnamed warrior of the Toblakai tribes, echo of the Karsa legacy.

name: Bottle
description: Bonehunter mage with odd magic, secret knowledge, and uncanny luck.

name: Sinn
description: A young girl with terrifying magic and unsettling calm.

name: Kartheron Crust
description: Imperial admiral, steadfast under fire and master of the seas.

name: Redmask
description: Disgraced Letherii commander turned War Leader of the Awl — brutal and brilliant.

name: Janath
description: Letherii rebel and lover of Tehol, quiet but crucial to revolution.

name: Orlong
description: Faithful shield and comic relief to Tavore's grim determination.

name: Crokus Younghand
description: Darujhistan thief drawn into the hands of gods — unwitting pawn of fate.

name: Aptorian Demon
description: Ferocious demon from Meanas, bound to protect Crokus and Shadow’s will.

name: Hood
description: The Lord of Death, bound by honor and unflinching in judgment.

name: The Crippled God
description: A shattered god of another realm, chained in pain and reshaping the world in madness.

name: Bugg
description: Humble manservant to Tehol, hiding his true identity as Mael, Elder God of the Seas.

name: Fear Sengar
description: Tiste Edur warrior and brother to Trull, torn between loyalty and conscience.

name: Hedge
description: Bridgeburner sapper and loyal friend, master of munitions and mayhem.

name: Mallet
description: Bridgeburner healer and medic, keeper of wounded souls and bodies.

name: Onos T'oolan
description: First Sword of the Imass, bound to eternal war but seeking peace through honor.

name: Poliel
description: Goddess of plague and disease, bitter and vengeful deity of suffering.

name: Ryllandaras
description: Ancient shapeshifter and D'ivers, master of forms and primal fury.

name: Seren Pedac
description: Letherii Acquitor, caught between empires and seeking her own path.

name: Silchas Ruin
description: Brother to Anomander Rake, the White Crow, bitter and powerful Tiste Andii.

name: Whiskeyjack
description: Sergeant of the Bridgeburners, beloved leader and tactical genius.
